articles.author: Rob Gillies
articles.title: Ontario slaps 25% increase on electricity exports to U.S. in response to Trump’s trade war - The Associated Press
articles.description: Ontario’s premier, the leader of Canada’s most populous province, is now charging 25% more for electricity shipped to 1.5 million Americans in response to U.S. President Donald Trump’s tariff plan. Ontario provides electricity to Minnesota, New York and Michi…
articles.content: TORONTO (AP) Ontarios premier, the leader of Canadas most populous province, announced that effective Monday it is charging 25% more for electricity to 1.5 million Americans in response to U.S. Presi… [+4300 chars]

articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: This month's 'blood moon' eclipse mirrors one Christopher Columbus used to scare indigenous people with in 1504 - Space.com
articles.description: On March 13-14, 2025, skywatchers in the Americas will witness a total lunar eclipse that mirrors one Christopher Columbus is said to have used to his advantage over five centuries ago.
articles.content: In 1504, Christopher Columbus, on his fourth trans-Atlantic voyage, was stranded on the shores of Jamaica, with his ships crawling with marine worms and his crew hungry. The Indigenous Arawak people,… [+2836 chars]
